name: San Francisco
description: San Francisco, located in northern California, is known for its iconic Golden Gate Bridge, cable cars, and diverse neighborhoods. The city is famous for its historic landmarks like Alcatraz Island, once a notorious prison, now a historic site offering tours. The steep streets of San Francisco offer stunning views of the bay and cityscape. The city's cultural scene is vibrant, with a rich history in music, art, and literature. San Francisco also boasts a thriving culinary scene, from seafood at Fisherman’s Wharf to the Mission District’s taquerias.

foods.name: Mission Burrito
foods.description: A large burrito filled with meat, beans, rice, salsa, and guacamole, originating in the Mission District.

foods.name: Cioppino
foods.description: A seafood stew originating in San Francisco, typically made with fish, shellfish, tomatoes, and wine.

foods.name: Sourdough Bread
foods.description: A type of bread made from a starter dough, known for its tangy flavor and crusty texture.

foods.name: Dungeness Crab
foods.description: A type of crab harvested from the Pacific Ocean, often served steamed or in crab cakes.

foods.name: Fortune Cookie
foods.description: A crisp cookie with a paper fortune inside, believed to have originated in San Francisco.

foods.name: Dim Sum
foods.description: A style of Chinese cuisine prepared as small bite-sized portions of food served in small steamer baskets or on small plates.

restaurants.name: Gary Danko
restaurants.description: A Michelin-starred restaurant offering contemporary American cuisine with a focus on local ingredients.

restaurants.name: The Slanted Door
restaurants.description: Renowned for its modern Vietnamese cuisine and views of the San Francisco Bay.

restaurants.name: House of Prime Rib
restaurants.description: A classic San Francisco restaurant known for its prime rib and old-school charm.

restaurants.name: Tartine Bakery & Cafe
restaurants.description: Famous for its freshly baked bread, pastries, and seasonal California cuisine.

restaurants.name: Zuni Cafe
restaurants.description: An iconic San Francisco restaurant offering Mediterranean-inspired cuisine and a lively atmosphere.

restaurants.name: Swan Oyster Depot
restaurants.description: A seafood counter offering fresh oysters, crab, clam chowder, and other seafood specialties.

hotels.name: Fairmont San Francisco
hotels.description: Historic luxury hotel with a classic style, located atop Nob Hill with stunning views of the city and bay.

hotels.name: The Ritz-Carlton, San Francisco
hotels.description: Elegant hotel offering luxury accommodations and impeccable service in the heart of San Francisco.

hotels.name: Hotel Nikko San Francisco
hotels.description: Modern hotel with Japanese-inspired decor, featuring a glass-enclosed indoor pool and a stylish rooftop bar.

hotels.name: The St. Regis San Francisco
hotels.description: Luxury hotel offering contemporary elegance and panoramic views of San Francisco.

hotels.name: InterContinental San Francisco
hotels.description: Modern hotel located in the vibrant South of Market district, offering upscale accommodations and amenities.

hotels.name: Hotel Vitale
hotels.description: Boutique hotel overlooking the Embarcadero waterfront, known for its spa and contemporary style.

transportation.name: San Francisco Cable Cars
transportation.description: Iconic cable car system in San Francisco, offering scenic rides through the city's hilly neighborhoods.

transportation.name: Bay Area Rapid Transit (BART)
transportation.description: Rapid transit system serving San Francisco and the Bay Area, connecting to major cities and airports.

transportation.name: San Francisco Muni
transportation.description: Public transit system in San Francisco, including buses, light rail, and historic streetcars.
